mapper.insert: insert into t_order(order_number, user_id, payment_type, total_money, name, area, detail_address, phone, fixed_phone, postcode, coupon_id) values (#{order.orderNumber}, #{order.userId}, #{order.paymentType}, #{order.totalMoney}, #{order.name}, #{order.area}, #{order.detailAddress}, #{order.phone}, #{order.fixedPhone}, #{order.postcode}, #{order.couponId});
mapper.select: select order_id, order_number, user_id, payment_status, payment_type, total_money, create_time, name, area, detail_address, phone, fixed_phone, postcode, order_status, coupon_id, gift_point, delete_status from t_order where delete_status = 0 and order_id = #{orderId}

select o.order_id, o.order_number, o.user_id, o.payment_status, o.payment_type, o.total_money, o.create_time, o.name, o.area, o.detail_address, o.phone, o.fixed_phone, o.postcode, o.order_status, o.coupon_id, o.gift_point, o.delete_status, oi.order_item_id, oi.order_id, oi.order_number, oi.product_id, oi.product_pic, oi.product_name, oi.product_price, oi.product_quantity, oi.delivery_type, oi.tracking_number, oi.delete_status from t_order o left join t_order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id where o.delete_status = 0 and o.user_id = #{userId}

select o.order_id, o.order_number, o.user_id, o.payment_status, o.payment_type, o.total_money, o.create_time, o.name, o.area, o.detail_address, o.phone, o.fixed_phone, o.postcode, o.order_status, o.coupon_id, o.gift_point, o.delete_status, oi.order_item_id, oi.order_id, oi.order_number, oi.product_id, oi.product_pic, oi.product_name, oi.product_price, oi.product_quantity, oi.delivery_type, oi.tracking_number, oi.delete_status from t_order o left join t_order_item oi on o.order_id = oi.order_id where o.delete_status = 0 and o.order_id = #{orderId};
